title: Looking For A Sans Match For Stempel (or Adobe) Garamond
content:
Hi,  
I am searching for a sans face to pair with Stempel or Adobe Garamond.  
Either will do if you know a match. In the example below, there is ITC Garamond paired with Akzidenz Grotesk. I am looking for something similar. Please let me know if you've got something!  
Thanks a lot.  
Ok, take 'er easy

J P H

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150221091210im_/http:/typophile.com/files/img0032_5028.jpg)
author: halloran

comments.content:
That "Garamond" is a Jannon. Which are we talking about?

hhp

Thanks a lot for the Claude.  
I was talking about a sans face to pair with Adobe or Stempel Garamond. I would really like to use Akzidenz. Would it be a crime to use Akzidenz with Stempel? Thanks again.

J P H

Not a crime.  
But it depends on what you want.  
Garamond has a stronger character Akzidenz-Grotesk has.  
So it only makes sense to use Garamond for the important part of your design. And AG for the other one.

Georg
